H0.text: what nba player has scored the most 3 pointers. Stephen Curry

H1.text: what nba player has scored the most 3 pointers. Reggie Miller

H2.text: what nba player has scored the most 3 pointers. Kyle Korver

H3.text: what nba player has scored the most 3 pointers. Ray Allen

A4.text: Curry made his 2,974th career three-pointer to pass Ray Allen and become the NBA's all-time three-point scoring leader.

A5.text: Curry became the NBA's all-time three-point scoring leader with 3,366 three-pointers, passing Ray Allen (3,358).

A6.text: Miller is currently sixth on the list behind Stephen Curry, James Harden, Ray Allen, Damian Lillard and Klay Thompson.

A7.text: His record was later broken by Ray Allen, who was later surpassed by Stephen Curry.

A8.text: Allen became the all-time NBA leader in total three-pointers made (2,562), surpassing Reggie Miller's record of 2,560.

A9.text: Korver ranks among the most prolific 3-point shooters in NBA history, ranking eighth all-time in 3-point field goals made
